snippet.title: NodeJS REST: Serve HTML Files and POST Requests (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
Serving HTML files is a very easy feature to implement using NodeJS. Today's video will teach you how to create a very basic Form using some HTML syntax. Using this form we'll enter some information for creating a User in our database.  We'll cover how to use a Post request to take in this data.
